title: Apple Event 2022: New Low-End iPhone Expected to Have 5G Service
sub_head: Next-generation iPhone SE to offer ultrafast connectivity, analysts predict, as the tech giant tries to keep its sales at a record pace
body:
Apple Inc. is bringing 5G cellular connectivity to cheaper iPhones, a move some on Wall Street say will continue to fuel record sales this year as concerns linger over demand for the more-expensive versions.
The Cupertino, Calif., tech giant is slated to reveal the third-generation iPhone SE on Tuesday during a virtual event on the companyâ€™s website. Apple is also expected to unveil an updated iPad Air with a faster processor as well as 5G, and new computers with faster chips, according to a person familiar with the plans.
